001package com.technototes.library.subsystem.drivebase;
002
003import com.qualcomm.robotcore.hardware.DcMotorSimple;
004import com.qualcomm.robotcore.util.Range;
005import com.technototes.library.hardware.motor.Motor;
006
007/** Class for drivebase subsystems
008 * @author Alex Stedman
009 * @param <T> The type of motor for the drivebase
010 */
011public class TankDrivebaseSubsystem<T extends DcMotorSimple> extends DrivebaseSubsystem<T> {
012
013    /** Drive motors
014     *
015     */
016    public Motor<T> leftSide, rightSide;
017
018    /** Create tank drivebase
019     *
020     * @param leftMotor The motor/motorgroup for the left side of the drivebase
021     * @param rightMotor The motor/motorgroup for the right side of the drivebase
022     */
023    public TankDrivebaseSubsystem(Motor<T> leftMotor, Motor<T> rightMotor) {
024        super(leftMotor, rightMotor);
025        leftSide = leftMotor;
026        rightSide = rightMotor;
027    }
028
029    public void arcadeDrive(double y, double x) {
030        double lp = y + x;
031        double rp = -y + x;
032        double scale = getScale(lp, rp);
033        double speed = Range.clip(Math.abs(y) + Math.abs(x), 0, 1);
034        scale = scale == 0 ? 0 : speed / scale;
035        drive(lp * scale, rp * scale);
036    }
037
038    public void stop() {
039        drive(0, 0);
040    }
041
042    public void drive(double l, double r) {
043        leftSide.setSpeed(l * getSpeed());
044        rightSide.setSpeed(r * getSpeed());
045    }
046}
